contents: @ISMIR'24, I will be presenting one tutorial (Connecting Music Audio and Natural Language), a paper (LP-dialog), and co-organizing a workshop (NLP4MusA).
I'm starting a research internship at Adobe. Collaborate with Nicholas J. Bryan and Ge Zhu
I'm starting a research internship at Chartmetric. Collaborate with Keunwoo Choi
I'm starting a research internship at NaverCorp (Now AI Team). Collaborate with Jeong Choi
As a visiting ph.D student, I will visit the NYU Data Science Center. Collaborate with Prof. Kyunghyun Cho.
I'm starting a research internship at ByteDance/Tiktok (Speech, Audio, and Music Intelligence Team). Collaborate with Keunwoo Choi, and MinzWon
